name: Sindhu-Indic Script Converter
description: Transform Sanskrit and Indic scripts with elegance and control. Example, rAma ЁЯФБ рд░рд╛рдо, рж░рж╛ржо, ри░ри╛рио, рк░рк╛рко, рм░рм╛рмо, ро░ро╛роо, р░░р░╛р░о, р▓░р▓╛р▓о, р┤░р┤╛р┤отАФand vice versa. Whether you're working with transliterated text or native scripts, Sindhu makes script conversion effortless and accurate.
author: Anant U
